caption.title: The mortality impacts of adaptation due to air pollution.
caption.p: Shown is the air-pollution-related mortality increase due to adaptation (the mid-century adaptation scenario minus the mid-century climate-only scenario) for (a) PM 2.5 as taken from the Expert F concentrationâ€“response function (the median function), (b) O 3 based on Levy et al. [ 97] using maximum daily 1-hour concentrations, and (c) O 3 based on Levy et al. [ 97] using maximum daily 8-hour average concentrations.
